Package io.github.moctave.weftspace

Class LoadedNode

java.lang.Object
io.github.moctave.weftspace.DataNode
io.github.moctave.weftspace.LoadedNode
public class LoadedNode extends DataNode
A subclass of a node that is attached to a specific line and file, for use in debugging.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • LoadedNode

      public LoadedNode(String name, DataNode.Flag flag, DataNode parent, List<String> args, List<DataNode> children, int line, File file)
      Sole constructor.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of this node, typically the first phrase present on its line.
      flag - A flag indicating how this node should be treated during instantiation.
      parent - This node's parent node (or null if it should be the root of its tree).
      args - A list of arguments attached to this node.
      children - A list of nodes which are children of this node.
      line - The line this node was loaded from.
      file - The file this node was loaded from.
